note.p: Daughter of John Wood (1825–91) and his second wife Emma Knox (née Ware). Lived in Lymington, Hampshire, 1939.
1939 Register (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG101/2352G)
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/138/100/12)
London, England, Church of England births and baptisms, 1813–1917 (Ancestry.com, accessed 26 June 2020)
